#  UNIVERSEH for Ukraine -- UNIVERSEH – European Space University for Earth and Humanity 

URL: https://universeh.agh.edu.pl/en/universeh-for-ukraine
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:02

Skip to content

Skip to footer

 UNIVERSEH for Ukraine 

The mission

The aim of the 
UNIVERSEH
 Extended for Ukraine project was to include partner universities from Ukraine in the 
activities of the European University UNIVERSEH
 alliance and to strengthen the existing cooperation in the area of New Space, with particular emphasis on improving students' competences, mobility and multilingualism. 

The Space Technology Centre AGH (STC)
, which is also responsible for the implementation and implementation of the 
UNIVERSEH
 project, was responsible for the implementation of the tasks.

The implementation 

The implementation of the project benefited all parties involved, both at the individual and organizational levels. The diversified program allowed students to develop soft skills (such as intercultural communication, networking, cooperation in an international environment, and language skills) as well as hard skills (acquiring new knowledge about space and expertise in entrepreneurship), and provided opportunities to participate in authentic events organized by the 
UNIVERSEH
 partnership.
